mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, CHNL_MSG_ID, CHNL_MSG_LNM, CHNL_MSG_PNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, STD_ERR_MSG_ID, ERR_CD, ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD, ERR_TP_CD, CHNL_TP_CD, ERR_CD_US_YN, CHNL_ERR_CD, CHNL_ERR_MSG_CTS, ERR_CD_APL_DT, ACTN_CD, CHNL_DTLS_CLCD, CHNL_GRP_CD
mapper.insert: insert /* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.insert */ into WAQ_CHNL_ERR_MSG (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, CHNL_MSG_ID, CHNL_MSG_LNM, CHNL_MSG_PNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, STD_ERR_MSG_ID, ERR_CD, ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD, ERR_TP_CD, CHNL_TP_CD, ERR_CD_US_YN, CHNL_ERR_CD, CHNL_ERR_MSG_CTS, ERR_CD_APL_DT, ACTN_CD, CHNL_DTLS_CLCD, CHNL_GRP_CD) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{chnlMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chnlMsgLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chnlMsgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stdErrMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errTlgLanDscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chnlTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errCdUsYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chnlErrCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chnlErrMsgCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errCdAplDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actnCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chnlDtlsClcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chnlGrpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_CHNL_ERR_MSG WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
insert /* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.insertSelective */ into WAQ_CHNL_ERR_MSG
RQST_NO,
RQST_SNO,
CHNL_MSG_ID,
CHNL_MSG_LNM,

STD_ERR_MSG_ID,
ERR_CD,
ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD,
ERR_TP_CD,
CHNL_TP_CD,
ERR_CD_US_YN,
CHNL_ERR_CD,
CHNL_ERR_MSG_CTS,
ERR_CD_APL_DT,
ACTN_CD,
CHNL_DTLS_CLCD,
CHNL_GRP_CD,

mapper.update:
update /* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.updateByPrimaryKeySelective */ WAQ_CHNL_ERR_MSG
CHNL_MSG_ID = #{chnlMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHNL_MSG_LNM = #{chnlMsgLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHNL_MSG_PNM = #{chnlMsgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STD_ERR_MSG_ID = #{stdErrMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERR_CD = #{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD = #{errTlgLanDscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERR_TP_CD = #{errTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHNL_TP_CD = #{chnlTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERR_CD_US_YN = #{errCdUsYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHNL_ERR_CD = #{chnlErrCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHNL_ERR_MSG_CTS = #{chnlErrMsgCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERR_CD_APL_DT = #{errCdAplDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTN_CD = #{actnCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHNL_DTLS_CLCD = #{chnlDtlsClcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHNL_GRP_CD = #{chnlGrpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update /* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.updateByPrimaryKey */ WAQ_CHNL_ERR_MSG set CHNL_MSG_ID = #{chnlMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHNL_MSG_LNM = #{chnlMsgLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHNL_MSG_PNM = #{chnlMsgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STD_ERR_MSG_ID = #{stdErrMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_CD = #{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD = #{errTlgLanDscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_TP_CD = #{errTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHNL_TP_CD = #{chnlTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_CD_US_YN = #{errCdUsYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHNL_ERR_CD = #{chnlErrCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHNL_ERR_MSG_CTS = #{chnlErrMsgCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_CD_APL_DT = #{errCdAplDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTN_CD = #{actnCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHNL_DTLS_CLCD = #{chnlDtlsClcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHNL_GRP_CD = #{chnlGrpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT /* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.selectMsgRqstListbyMst */ A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.CHNL_MSG_ID, A.CHNL_MSG_LNM, A.CHNL_MSG_PNM, A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS, A.VRF_RMK, A.VRF_CD, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END AS FontColor , U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , A.STD_ERR_MSG_ID, A.ERR_CD, A.ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD, A.ERR_TP_CD, A.CHNL_TP_CD, A.ERR_CD_US_YN, A.CHNL_ERR_CD, A.CHNL_ERR_MSG_CTS, A.ERR_CD_APL_DT, A.ACTN_CD, A.CHNL_DTLS_CLCD, A.CHNL_GRP_CD FROM WAQ_CHNL_ERR_MSG A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.updateCheckInit */ WAQ_CHNL_ERR_MSG A SET A.REG_TYP_CD = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.CHNL_MSG_ID ) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END FROM WAM_CHNL_ERR_MSG B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') -- AND B.CHNL_MSG_ID = A.CHNL_MSG_ID AND CASE WHEN A.CHNL_MSG_ID IS NULL THEN A.ERR_CD ELSE A.CHNL_MSG_ID END = CASE WHEN A.CHNL_MSG_ID IS NULL THEN B.ERR_CD ELSE B.CHNL_MSG_ID END ) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
/* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.checkRequestMsg */
--검증쿼리 : 등록요청 중인 메시지 존재....(MS012) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_CHNL_ERR_MSG D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.CHNL_ERR_CD = D.CHNL_ERR_CD AND IFNULL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )

/* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.checkNotExistMsg */
--검증쿼리 존재하지 않는 메시지 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_CHNL_ERR_MSG D WHERE A.CHNL_ERR_CD = D.CHNL_ERR_CD AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

/* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.checkLenMsg */
--검증쿼리 MS003 길이체크 (8) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND LENGTH(A.CHNL_ERR_CD) != 8

/* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.checkNotChgData */
--검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_CHNL_ERR_MSG D WHERE A.CHNL_ERR_CD = D.CHNL_ERR_CD AND IFNULL(A.STD_ERR_MSG_ID , '') = IFNULL(D.STD_ERR_MSG_ID , '') AND IFNULL(A.ERR_CD , '') = IFNULL(D.ERR_CD , '') AND IFNULL(A.ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD , '') = IFNULL(D.ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD , '') AND IFNULL(A.ERR_TP_CD, '') = IFNULL(D.ERR_TP_CD , '') AND IFNULL(A.CHNL_TP_CD, '') = IFNULL(D.CHNL_TP_CD , '') AND IFNULL(A.ERR_CD_US_YN, '') = IFNULL(D.ERR_CD_US_YN , '') AND IFNULL(A.CHNL_ERR_MSG_CTS, '') = IFNULL(D.CHNL_ERR_MSG_CTS , '') AND IFNULL(A.ERR_CD_APL_DT, '') = IFNULL(D.ERR_CD_APL_DT , '') AND IFNULL(A.ACTN_CD, '') = IFNULL(D.ACTN_CD , '') AND IFNULL(A.CHNL_DTLS_CLCD, '') = IFNULL(D.CHNL_DTLS_CLCD , '') AND IFNULL(A.CHNL_GRP_CD, '') = IFNULL(D.CHNL_GRP_CD , '') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') )
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.updatervwStsCd */ WAQ_CHNL_ERR_MSG
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = NOW() , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND IFNULL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'
mapper.sql: CHNL_MSG_LNM, CHNL_MSG_PNM, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, STD_ERR_MSG_ID, ERR_CD, ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD, ERR_TP_CD, CHNL_TP_CD, ERR_CD_US_YN, CHNL_ERR_CD, CHNL_ERR_MSG_CTS, ERR_CD_APL_DT, ACTN_CD, CHNL_DTLS_CLCD, CHNL_GRP_CD
mapper.select: SELECT /* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.selectWaqC */ * FROM WAQ_CHNL_ERR_MSG WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: --WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE /* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.updateWaqCUD */ WAQ_CHNL_ERR_MSG A SET (CHNL_MSG_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.CHNL_MSG_ID AS CHNL_MSG_ID , IFNULL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_CHNL_ERR_MSG B WHERE B.CHNL_ERR_CD = A.CHNL_ERR_CD AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_CHNL_ERR_MSG B WHERE B.CHNL_ERR_CD = A.CHNL_ERR_CD AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE /* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.deleteWAM */ FROM WAM_CHNL_ERR_MSG A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CHNL_ERR_MSG B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.CHNL_ERR_CD = A.CHNL_ERR_CD )
mapper.insert:
--WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT /* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.insertWAM */ INTO WAM_CHNL_ERR_MSG SELECT A.CHNL_MSG_ID,
FROM WAQ_CHNL_ERR_MSG A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE /* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.updateWAH */ WAH_CHNL_ERR_MSG A SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CHNL_ERR_MSG B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.CHNL_ERR_CD = A.CHNL_ERR_CD ) AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert:
--WAH이력 적재... INSERT /* WaqChnlErrMsgMapper.insertWAH */ INTO WAH_CHNL_ERR_MSG SELECT A.CHNL_MSG_ID , STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AS EXP_DTM , NOW() AS STR_DTM ,
FROM WAQ_CHNL_ERR_MSG A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
